name: flower-veil
effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.
short_effect: Protects friendly grass Pokémon from having their stats lowered by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.x_y: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon’s stats.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon’s stats.
